Description.Name: If you build it...
Description.Details: You glance through the window pane as you pass by the library onboard the Argo and notice [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] surrounded by a mountain of manuals. Your curiousity peaked, you decide to see what's going on and stroll over to {SCN_MW.Obj}. "Greetings MechWarrior!" you state as you approach the cluttered desk. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] looks up from {SCN_MW.Det} work and smiles, "Well met, Commander. You were looking for me, quiaff?" You still find it hard to get used to clan language structure, but know enough to respect {SCN_MW.Det} beliefs and respond accordingly, "Quineg, I was just passing by and noticed you deep in what appears to be a research project. I have to admit, I'm curious to see what has captured your interest, if you care to share?" [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] smiles, "Aff Commander. As you know, I came to be a part of your crew when you rescued me after I was rendered unconscious in battle. While I appreciate you providing me with one of your company mechs, I feel I can be of more value to you, and to {COMPANY.CompanyName} if I had my original mech, Last Rites." You nod, knowing most of this from [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s personel file, "Correct me if I am wrong, but wasn't your mech pretty much destroyed when Cloud Cobra attacked Rasalhague?" You can see the pain in {SCN_MW.Det} eyes at the mention of that famous battle, "Aff Commander, it was. I should have died then, but it was not yet my time. Now, I have spent my off duty time searching records, schematics and Star Charts to hopefully rebuild Last Rites so I will no longer be [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[Lore_Powless],powless]] and I can once again be in command of a proper battlemech." You raise an eyebrow at that last comment, "Interesting, and what do you plan on doing now that you have this information? You're contract with us is still active for quite some time you know." "Aff, Commander," [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] responds. "That is why I am doing all the background work before submitting my formal request to you." You smile, knowing where this is going, "Let's just assume you've done all the background work already and skip straight to the request shall we?" [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] smiles, "Aff, Commander. I formally request permission to obtain the parts to rebuild Last Rites, a 70 ton custom Minsk MNK-102. In return, I pledge, on my honour, to treat {COMPANY.CompanyName} as if it were my own Clan until I die." You whistle slowly, "That, my friend, is quite the request. Tell you what, you get all the info together and we can discuss this again at that time." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] reaches down and picks up a datapad and hands it to you, "I have all of that information ready now, Commander. The necessary parts are located on 7 different star systems, with most of those in, or near, Rasalhague space. We can go over the details now, quiaff?"

Description.Name: Postponed
Description.Details:
You calmly look over at [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and take the offered datapad, "I appreciate you doing the leg work on this project of yours.  When I have the time, I'll go over your data and see how it benefits {COMPANY.CompanyName}.  I hope you understand."

[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] doesn't seem phased by your response as a big smile appears on {SCN_MW.Det} face, "You are the Commander, and you have declared we wait.  We shall wait until the time is right Commander, quiaff?"

You return the smile, "Aff. MechWarrior.  I'll look this over soon."  As you depart the library, it dawns on you just how charismatic [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] is, knowing that at some point, you'll eventually agree to {SCN_MW.Det} plans.

Description.Name: Aff, Let's see what you got
Give it to me baby!
